name: Jules The Dev
summary: Full-stack developer with a passion for game development and pixel art. I create immersive web experiences and fun games.
philosophy: Design is not just what it looks like and feels like. Design is how it works. I believe in user-centric design that solves real problems while providing delightful experiences.

testimonials.quote: Jules is an exceptional designer who balances aesthetics with functionality perfectly.
testimonials.author: Jane Doe, PM at Tech Corp

testimonials.quote: The best collaborative partner I've had. Solves problems before they exist.
testimonials.author: John Smith, Lead Dev
